arts.ttl: Championship: Predictions for all 12 weekend games
arts.sum: LiveScore serves up previews and picks for all 12 Championship games.

arts.ttl: Derby County vs Bristol City Preview: EFL Championship, Matchday 3, 2025
arts.sum: The third gameweek of the EFL Championship kicks off on Friday night as Derby County host Bristol City at Pride Park as the Rams look to get some points on the board after a rough start to their 25/26 campaign. Derby County will look to pick up their first win in the league against a side that they have struggled against as of late, in Bristol City .

arts.ttl: Ward starts: Derby County team news and predicted XI to face Bristol City
arts.sum: The latest Derby County team news and predicted XI as John Eustace's side gear up to face Bristol City. The post Ward starts: Derby County team news and predicted XI to face Bristol City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
